title: Pichai Paathiram Lyrics Naan Kadavul
stanzas:
pindam ennum,
elumbodu sadhai narambu
udhiramum adangiya
udambu enum

pindam ennum,
elumbodu sadhai narambu
udhiramum adangiya
udambu enum

ammaiyum appanum thanthatha
illai aadhiyin val vinai soozhnthatha (2)

immaiyai naan ariyathatha
immaiyai naan ariyathatha
siru bommaiyin nilayinil
unmaiyai unarnthida

athanai selvamum un idathil
naan pichaikku selvathu evvidathil (2)
verum paathiram ullathu en idathil
athan soothiramo athu un idathil

oru muraiya iru muraiya
pala murai pala pirappu
edukka vaithaai

puthu vinaya pazha vinaya,
kanam kanam dinam
 enai thudikka vaithai

un arul arul arul endru
alaikindra manam
indru pithatruthe

arul vizhiyaal nokkuvai
malar pathathal thaanguvai
un thiru karam enai
aravanaithu unatharul pera

pindam ennum,
elumbodu sadhai narambu
udhiramum adangiya
udambu enum

seo.title: Pichai Paathiram Lyrics Naan Kadavul
seo.description: Get the complete Pichai Paathiram Lyrics Naan Kadavul from Naan Kadavul. Read the lyrics penned by Ilaiyaraaja and composed by Ilaiyaraaja and sung by Madhu Balakrishnan. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Ilaiyaraaja, Naan Kadavul, Ilaiyaraaja, Madhu Balakrishnan, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
